v2-dev.purpose: Active development branch for redesign, UI changes, new features.

readme.status: Custom README is safe. Will not be overwritten by GitHub.
readme.rule: Always commit README.md manually before push.

workflow_commands.create_new_version_branch: git checkout -b v3-dev && git push -u origin v3-dev
workflow_commands.push_changes: git add . && git commit -m "message" && git push
workflow_commands.merge_dev_to_main: git checkout main && git merge v2-dev && git push
workflow_commands.tag_new_release: git tag -a v2.0.0 -m "Version 2 release" && git push origin v2.0.0
